title: INGERSOLL: American Culture Saw The Transgender Trojan Horse Coming
description: It seems, if not providential, at least poetic that this whole institutional mutilation of children thing came to a head in the aftermath of COVID.
content:
Greetings, Dear Reader,
I’m not one to believe in vast conspiracies. The problem with them is that they are vast. In my experience, you get much more than four people knowing something, and it’s alr… [+8425 chars]
